
4. Manual testing:
   - Trigger different error scenarios in the application
   - Verify error messages are displayed correctly
   - Check that TodaysTasks component renders and functions properly

5. Code review:
   - Have another developer review the type definitions
   - Ensure interfaces are comprehensive and well-structured
   - Verify no 'any' types remain in the modified files

6. Integration testing:
   - Test the components in the context of their parent components
   - Verify error handling works end-to-end
   - Check that task data flows correctly through the TodaysTasks component

tasks.title: Create Collapsible Menu Bar Component with Toggle Button
tasks.description: Implement a responsive sidebar menu component that is closed by default and can be toggled open/closed with a button positioned at the top of the page, featuring smooth animations.
tasks.testStrategy:
1. Unit test the MenuBar and MenuToggleButton components:
   ```bash
   npm test -- --watch MenuBar.test.tsx MenuToggleButton.test.tsx
   ```
   - Test that the menu is closed by default
   - Test that clicking the toggle button opens/closes the menu
   - Test that the correct CSS classes are applied based on the open/closed state

2. Test the animation functionality:
   - Verify the menu slides in/out smoothly with the expected timing
   - Check that transitions work correctly in different browsers
   - Ensure animations don't cause layout shifts or performance issues

3. Test responsive behavior:
   - Use browser dev tools to test on different screen sizes
   - Verify the menu and toggle button are properly positioned on mobile devices
   - Check that touch interactions work as expected

4. Accessibility testing:
   - Verify the menu is keyboard accessible (can be opened/closed with keyboard)
   - Test with screen readers to ensure proper ARIA attributes are used
   - Check that focus is properly managed when opening/closing the menu
   - Verify color contrast meets WCAG standards

5. Integration testing:
   - Ensure the menu works correctly when integrated with the main application layout
   - Test navigation by clicking on menu items
   - Verify the menu state is preserved when navigating between pages

6. Cross-browser testing:
   - Test in Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge
   - Verify animations and positioning work consistently across browsers

7. Performance testing:
   - Check that animations run at 60fps
   - Verify that the menu doesn't cause performance issues when opening/closing
